pullActionsFromChat.name: Pull actions from chat
pullActionsFromChat.hint: When enabled, actions used in the chat will automatically be removed from the relevant token's turn actions.

playersCanRestoreActions.name: Players can restore used actions
playersCanRestoreActions.hint: When enabled, players with owner permissions on a combatant can remove used actions from that combatant's action tracker.

refreshCombatantActionsWhen.name: Refresh combatant actions time
refreshCombatantActionsWhen.hint: Determines what event should reset combatant action trackers to their turn start values

refresh_combatant_actions_when_options.onlyManual: Only allow manual refreshing of actions

checkActionUsability.name: Action usability check type
checkActionUsability.hint: Determines what the behavior should be when a combatant uses actions or reactions that they don't have enough remaining to use.

check_action_usability_options.block: Warn the player and block the action

conditionsApplyToActions.name: Conditions apply to combatant actions
conditionsApplyToActions.hint: Determines whether conditions which affect actions (like disoriented, stunned, and surprised) affect the actions on a combatant's turn

warning.notEnoughActionType: {actor} does not have enough {actionCostType}s to use {actionName}!
